channel.title: How to make someone a donator, or Staff on a 562, I cant find out how
channel.description: Hi, and recently i downloaded painzone [562] but i cannot find out how to make someone staff because the character files are .xml, not .dat or .txt, will someone help me pls. thx.

item.title: How to make someone a donator, or Staff on a 562, I cant find out how
item.dc:creator: @Z-Codez Z-Codez
item.description:
@Z-Codez wrote:

A purple box?
Thats the admin screen. Or known as The developers consol.
hmmm… just press ` then type:
master
item
ect.
NOTE.
You dont need to add “::” infront of the commands.
If you need anymore help just message ;D

Read full topic

item.title: How to make someone a donator, or Staff on a 562, I cant find out how
item.dc:creator: @Z-Codez Z-Codez
item.description:
@Z-Codez wrote:

Data>SavedGames>CHARACTER_NAME.
(Ctrl+F) Rights. 1mod 2admin 3co-owner. or what ever.
(Ctrl+F) Donator 0 change that “0” to “1”.

Or you could make “giveadmin” “givemod” & “givedonor” commands.
^ if you want these message me and ill get them you :).
Hope i helped. :rolleyes:

Read full topic
